about_the_game:
In Stolen Color, you will find yourself in the role of a strange gentleman with a glowing ball instead of a head, living in a dream world. A thief got into your house and stole the main value - a color with unusual properties. Chase down the thief and reclaim what's yours as you fight your way through hordes of nightmares and encounter the bizarre inhabitants of the dream world.

Intense quick fights
With the help of a long sword, firearms and various superpowers, break through fast enemies and strong bosses who want to cloud your mind.

Journey through the fantasy world of Sleep
In the world of sleep, extraordinary and strange inhabitants and no less bizarre environments that distort time and space await you.

Superpowers
In the Dream World, you will have extremely unusual abilities: Teleportation, flight and spectacular magic.
